pages.text: A Resonating wand is used to start the crafting process in $(item)Astral Sorcery$() crafting tables.$(br2)Required knowledge:$(br)$(l:sim_2/knowledge/1_as)Lunar Insight$()

pages.title: Luminous Crafting Table
pages.description1: Drop a $(item)Crafting Table$() into $(l:sim_2/resources/0_surface_level)Liquid Starlight$() to create the $(item)Luminous Crafting Table$().$(br2)This workbench can harness $(item)Starlight$() to craft items with Magical properties.$(br2)Later workbench $(item)Tiers$() require a multiblock structure.$(br)(Can be found in $(l:portal_hub/4_schematica)Schematica$())

pages.text: The $(item)Lightwell$() can draw out the $(item)Liquid Starlight$() that collects in $(l:sim_2/resources/1_minerals_and_ores)Aquamarines$() and $(l:sim_2/resources/1_minerals_and_ores)Rock Crystals$().$(br2)You will need to create a fair amount of $(item)Liquid Starlight$() to progress in this $(item)Simulation$().

This ore is absolutely packed with $(item)Star$() power. It's created by pointing a concetrated beam of starlight toward a $(item)Iron Ore Block$().$(br2)You can find $(item)Floating Crystals$() in the larger shrines found on the $(item)Lunar Plane$(), use a $(item)Linking Tool$() to direct their natural $(item)Starlight$().
